task: Summoning charm; Summons an object towards the caster
Water-making spell; produces a clean, drinkable stream of water from wand tip
Unlocking Charm: Unlocks doors and other locked objects
Revealing Charm; reveals secret messages written in invisible ink
Slowing Charm; decreases velocity of moving target
killing curse; causes instantaneous death
transfigures the target to bird
Exploding charm; provokes a small explosion
Locking spell; locks doors and all possible things than can be locked
Used to heal minor injuries
Patronous Charm; advanced protective spell which conjure a spirit guardian of their positive emotions
Disarming Charm; forces whatever an opponent is holding to fly out of the hand
Expulso curse; provokes an explosion, which uses pressure causing heat
Smokescreen spell; creates defensive homescreen that hinders visibility
Doubling Charm; duplicates the target object
Freezing spell; freezes the target with cold air
Herbivicus Charm; rapidly grows plants
Human-Presence revealing spell; reveals human presence in the vicinity of caster
Freezing Charm; immobilises and stops the action of the target
Imperius curse; places the target completely under the control of caster
Fire-Making spell; produces fire all around
Wand-Lighting spell; illuminates the tip of caster's wand
Memory Charm; erases specific memories
Shield Charm; invisible shield that reflects spells and blocks physical entities
Shrinking Charm; makes the target shrink in size
Reductor curse; breaks the object
Tickling Charm; tickles the target until they become weak with laughter
Stunning spell; stuns the target, or makes them unconscious
Windy spell; shoots a jet of strong spiral wind from tip of wand
Levitation Charm; makes the objects fly
